466: A busy and family-owned plant nursery in Homestead, Fl is looking for an experienced grower. Looking for someone with managerial skills to help organize employee crews and maintain nursery plants. Strong communication skills are important as well as the ability to adapt to an ever changing work environment. Bilingual preferred but not necessary. Duties include: Overseeing production of all plants Spraying/application of fertilizers Maintenance of wide array of varieties of plants Job Type: Full-time Pay: $20.00 - $30.00 per hour Benefits: Health insurance Paid time off Schedule: 8 hour shift Monday to Friday Ability to commute/relocate: Miami, FL 33170: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required) Work Location: In person
